level.heading: Federal financial participation.
level.text: The Mayor shall claim federal financial participation for foster care payments to the fullest extent permissible under the provisions of title IV of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. § 601 et seq.).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.
